i tend to argue with myself more than i argue with myself.
I've been with myself for the longest time, and it's been a bumpy ride.
i like to try different beers from various countries.

I am a person who loves the cold weather and enjoys living in rural Wisconsin.

content.text: What is your favorite type of beer?
I love all types of beer, but my favorite is a stout. What about you?
I like stouts too, but I also like IPAs and lagers.
That's cool. I'm from Georgia, but I live in rural Wisconsin now. I love the cold weather here. Do you like where you live?
I love it here! I live in a small town in the Midwest. People are friendly and helpful.
That's great! I'm studying to be a special education teacher. What do you do for a living?
I'm a teacher too! I teach English to children in elementary school.
That's awesome! I love working with children.
Me too! It's the best job in the world.
I'm glad you enjoy your job. I know I will enjoy mine when I start teaching.
I'm sure you will! You sound like you'd be a great teacher.
Thanks! I'm excited to start my career.
